name: Suspicious File Download from File Sharing Domain
description: Detects the download of suspicious file type from a well-known file and paste sharing domain
query: (Contents:(/.*[Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp][Ss]\:\/\/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh]\/.*/ OR /.*[Rr][Aa][Ww]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\/.*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]\/.*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn].*/) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\:[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss]\:[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]\:[Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(Contents:(*https\:\/\/transfer.sh\/* OR *raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *send.exploit.in*) AND file.path:(*.exe\:Zone* OR *.vbs\:Zone* OR *.dll\:Zone*))`
